website_summaries.verdict: Gives you a good level of maneuverability versus most commercial tire options on hard-surface roads.
pros: Yields a smooth ride when you have to go long distances
Tread design will wear evenly over time, giving you a longer lasting tire
Has a good level of performance, especially on hard-surface roads
Extra thickness in the rib area to resist blowouts
cons: Could perform better on rough roads
Not quite the build quality of some others

customer_reviews.title: These tires came in looking better than I had expected
customer_reviews.text: These tires came in looking better than I had expected, even though they are made in China. But, some of the name brand tires are made there also, so... So far, they are wearing well. Used them on the front end of a Ford F-450 with dual rear tires. Wear is exceptional. Would recommend these for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Mclain

customer_reviews.title: Love the tire
customer_reviews.text: Love the tire, we have a tow truck and so far it has been impressive, we will see how it holds up in Ohio with our terrible road, but the ride is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be well-built tires they have a deep generous rib for steel plies one steel side wall play for the speed rating and the weight rating Seems like the best deal out there I put these on the front of my 4500 Dodge and we did not balance them I do not notice any difference in vibration or anything due to not balancing of them. Looking forward to ordering 4 more soon I now have 6 new tires on my Ram 4500 these seem to support the weight better than the original ones. Very happy delivered quickly
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and good tires for my F-450
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a lot to say about these, other than they were inexpensive and have provided good traction on my 2008 F-450 dually. Plan on about $300 to mount these (and you'll have to get it done at a shop that works on semi tires), and the disposal fee *per tire* is about $15 in 2019. I'm happy with the tires and hope they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Tires were delivered on time and looked great. Installed them on the front of my motor home.they are a great tire for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value RV Tire!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are a great value to use on RV’s. Seem to hold out very well! Big savings! Well made!
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: so good. These tires perform and ride nicely
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. These tires perform and ride nicely.
customer_reviews.author: mike monahan

customer_reviews.title: Price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed these for my RV. Saved about $300 overall by ordering them online.
customer_reviews.author: Aardvark

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: What a good tire at a great price they work great and are quiet I hope they last
customer_reviews.author: oaktrac

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: put these on older motorhome and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: The r216 good tires
customer_reviews.text: Used these tires on my box truck just had them on for a few days but like them so far i beleave they will be great tires for the price
customer_reviews.author: dale k.

customer_reviews.title: awesome tires
customer_reviews.text: So far the best seller with awesome tires thank you probably will buy again
customer_reviews.author: JMR Structural Steel Fabricator

customer_reviews.title: They look nice. Give an update on our review after we ...
customer_reviews.text: They look nice. Give an update on our review after we put them on our RV.
customer_reviews.author: BREEZE

customer_reviews.title: Don't Recommend for Truck!
customer_reviews.text: Can't hold weight specified at pressure! Squeegee on the rear of truck. All over the road! DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! Strong tires!
customer_reviews.text: These tires far exceeded our expectations! TBH, for the price we weren't sure the quality would be up to par. Just got them delivered and even my husband was stunned. Sidewalls are very strong, tread looks like it will last for years( which of course it should), and overall they just look great! VERY happy with them! Better looking in person than the stock photos! Made in China, but even the name brands probably are too these days, really.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haden

product_meta.title: Roadlux R216 Commercial Radial Tire-225/70R19.5 126M
product_meta.description: The ideal tire for both highway and rough asphalt surfaces. Extra long tread life. Outstanding resistance to irregular wear. Superb maneuverability. Superior resistance to rib tearing.
feature_bullets: The ideal tire for both highway and rough asphalt surfaces
